analyzed: srid dang zhi pa'i bde ster aindra bh'u ti'i zhal kyi  rim pas rgyud las sdeb sbyor gyis dbyung bya //

analyzed: de ltar sgyu ma smig rgyu ltar mdzes shir //

analyzed: spros nas sprul pa'i nyams kyis rgyal rnams mchod // sems can ma lus sangs rgyas byang chub ni //

original: mchog la nges sbyar der ni longs spyod sku //
analyzed: mchog la nges sbyar der ni longs spyod sku //

original: de nyid de bzhin chos skur nges brtags te //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin chos skur nges brtags te //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi kun sbyong tha snyad bshad //
translated: The purification of the yoginƒ´s is explained with conventional terms.

original: d'u t'i bha bam r'a dzi ka y'a gri h'i tam ta y'a sa ma yam sa matti /
analyzed: d'u t'i bha bam r'a dzi ka y'a gri h'i tam ta y'a sa ma yam sa matti /

original: ming med dang ni mthe bong kha dag gis //
analyzed: ming med dang ni mthe bong kha dag gis //

original: chos 'byung gzugs brnyan dbus su sangs rgyas mchod //
analyzed: chos 'byung gzugs brnyan dbus su sangs rgyas mchod //
translated: one should make offerings to the buddhas in the center of the image of the source of phenomena.

original: stobs dang stobs min de nyid shes //
analyzed: stobs dang stobs min de nyid shes //

original: gsar sngags ro la zhes par sngags bzlas bya //
analyzed: gsar sngags ro la zhes par sngags bzlas bya //

analyzed: gtor ma'i de nyid blo yis gtor ma sbyin //

original: ci 'dod sgron me mchog dang 'o ma btung //
analyzed: ci 'dod sgron me mchog dang 'o ma btung //

original: h'a ro pa d'a do la nges brtags pas //
analyzed: h'a ro pa d'a do la nges brtags pas //

analyzed: ye shes 'char ba'i snang ba mchog gis ni //

analyzed: rtag chad rmongs pa'i mun nag che gzhom bya //

original: 'di nyid @161a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid @161a * //
translated: This

analyzed: bde ba'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor te //

original: rdor pad sbyor las 'pho med thugs rdo rje //
analyzed: rdor pad sbyor las 'pho med thugs rdo rje //
